name: Jump Out
description:
Precision Platformer - Jump Out: A minimalist game with a simple goal: get to the top!
Jump Out is a platformer that challenges you to ascend through obstacles and hazards. You will need to hone your jumping skills and overcome your own limits. Inspired by other games that make climbing a struggle, Jump Out will test your perseverance and reward your achievement.

Gameplay:

  • WASD movement to climb and jump, simple but demanding controls.
  • Saving mechanics? Be gone! - you have to reach the top in one go.
  • Earn achievements and aim for the S+ rank (Masochist's delight!)
  • Meet Pen, your mischievous jumping robot companion.
  • Pixel art graphics and the retro-style animations.
  • The equivalent to stepping on a plug when you fall.



“What goes up must come down.” - Isaac Newton
